metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9843

Platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 12
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Containers 12

metadata.Description: The crc32_big function in crc32.c in zlib 1.2.8 might allow context-dependent attackers to have unspecified impact via vectors involving big-endian CRC calculation.
